name: WitchHunt (Thammembaum)
description:
What are you doing in my swamp?!

Take the role as the witch and defend yourself from these pesky villagers in this top-down wave shooter!

Once upon a time, there was a peaceful village, surrounded by flowery meadows and fertile soil. The villagers had everything, from food to feed all, to clean water. 

Until...

 one day an evil witch found a home in the nearby swamp and demanded offerings, so she would not curse them. She was pleased with goats, firstborns, or virgins, but the Village hadn’t those in endless supply, so they decided to end their oppression! With pitchforks and torches as weapons, they gathered and made their way to the witch, to kill her – but they seemed to underestimate her power.

MovementAttack
 
Special Attack

Programming:
zlCobra & Tilaon

Sound:
Tilaon

UI/UX:
Thammembaum

Pixel Art:
Znowy & D-Draco & DeltaCakeQ
